fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Throw your knife at someone's house, dealing a Powerful attack, but this is reduced to Basic if they don't visit because throwing a knife through a window is hard.
- Deploy mini sentient rocks with knives to people's homes, dealing a Basic attack to the first person to visit the target, and a Basic attack to the target when someone visits them. Your mini sentient rocks stay active until triggered, but you can only have one active at a time because you would have to underpay your employees to have multiple.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Can use both abilities in the same night.
- Your sentient rocks cannot kill other Rock faction members.
